name: mikroe.click.canfd7
short_description: CAN FD 7 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a CAN transceiver that supports both CAN and CAN FD protocols. This board features the TCAN1462, an automotive fault-protected CAN FD transceiver from Texas Instruments. It is a high-speed Controller Area Network (CAN) transceiver that meets the ISO 11898-2:2016 high-speed CAN specification and the CiA 601-4 signal improvement capability (SIC) specification.
